name: DeleteAsanaStory
description:
Delete a story you've created on Asana.

This tool deletes a story on Asana if the story was created by the user. It should be called when a user wants to remove their own stories for tasks or projects in Asana.

parameters.name: story_unique_id
parameters.description: Globally unique identifier for the story to be deleted.

value_schema.description: Globally unique identifier for the story.

parameters.name: enable_pretty_output
parameters.description: Enable this for a readable, formatted response. Useful for debugging, but increases response time.

value_schema.description:
Provides “pretty” output.
Provides the response in a “pretty” format. In the case of JSON this means doing proper line breaking and indentation to make it readable. This will take extra time and increase the response size so it is advisable only to use this during debugging.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the asana API.

parameters.description:

parameters.name: story_gid
parameters.description: Globally unique identifier for the story.

value_schema.description: Globally unique identifier for the story.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
